mapper.select: SELECT u.id AS user_id, u.username, u.nickname, ss.sign_id, ss.ip, ss.create_time, ss.id, ss.status from lin_user AS u, student_sign AS ss WHERE u.id = ss.user_id AND ss.sign_id = #{signId} AND ss.status = 1

SELECT u.id AS user_id, u.username, u.nickname, ss.sign_id, ss.ip, ss.create_time, ss.id, ss.status from lin_user AS u, student_sign AS ss WHERE u.id = ss.user_id AND ss.sign_id = #{signId} AND ss.status = 2

SELECT u.id AS user_id, u.username, u.nickname, ss.sign_id, ss.ip, ss.create_time, ss.id, ss.status from lin_user AS u, student_sign AS ss WHERE u.id = ss.user_id AND ss.sign_id = #{signId} AND ss.status = 3

SELECT u.id AS user_id, u.username, u.nickname, ss.id, ss.sign_id, ss.ip, ss.create_time, ss.status FROM lin_user AS u LEFT JOIN student_sign AS ss ON u.id = ss.user_id WHERE u.id IN ( SELECT sc.user_id FROM student_class AS sc WHERE sc.class_id = ( SELECT sl.class_id from sign_list AS sl WHERE sl.id = #{signId} ) )
